item.title: The art of doing nothing
item.description: This article is not some magical spell kind of an essay that makes you devoid of the curse known as ‚ÄúProcrastination‚Äù, so it is better to keep aside your expectations and enjoy this small yet interesting post. Many a times in our lives we get bright ideas such as, an idea for the next unicorn startup, a solution for the traffic problem in Bangalore, or even smaller scale ideas like, garbage disposal problem in your house, keeping the house clean, organising ourselves, etc.

item.title: Welcome to my website
item.description: Found this amazing template, so checking it out. Will update the content here as and when I have something sensible to say. Peace !!

item.title: About Me
item.description: If you want to know me professionally, here is my resume. Things you won’t find on my resume Love to drive cars and bikes. Anytime. Always updated with latest in the tech world. In fact, I am updated about most things in the world üòé An avid sleeper.
